Heres an annoying thing I picked up. I have a bunch of status variables such as health, mana, etc. I categorize these so with other variables. This is what I want them to look like:

--- Character Stats ---
Health: 100
Mana: 100
Name: FudgePacker McGee
Age: 14
Magical Ability: 1000
--- Universal Stats ---
Time: 10:00
Weather: Sunny
Date: 10/9/08

And I get this (in game):

--- Character Stats ---
Health: 100
Mana: 100
Name: FudgePacker McGee
Time: 10:00
Weather: Sunny
Date: 10/9/08
Age: 14
Magical Ability: 1000
--- Universal Stats ---


So I think that the order they appear in the status variables box should be the order they appear ingame.
